verses.verse: He <S%G2532><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> country, <S%G3968><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> him were astonished, <S%G1605><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4159><s%> did this <S%G5129><s%> man get these things? <S%G5023><s%>" and, <S%G2532><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to this man, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> mighty works <S%G1411><s%> come about <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands? <S%G5495><s%>

Isn't <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> the carpenter, <S%G5045><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Mary, <S%G1161><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of James, <S%G2385><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Joses, <S%G2499><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Judah, <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Simon? <S%G4613><s%> Aren't <S%G1526><s%> <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%>" They <S%G2532><s%> were offended <S%G4624><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G3754><s%> "A prophet <S%G4396><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> without honor, <S%G820><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> country, <S%G3968><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> his own relatives, <S%G4773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3614><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> mighty work <S%G1411><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> except that <S%G1487><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on a <S%G3361><s%> few <S%G3641><s%> sick people, <S%G732><s%> and healed them. <S%G2323><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> unbelief. <S%G570><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G4013><s%> around <S%G2945><s%> the villages <S%G2968><s%> teaching. <S%G1321><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> to himself the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to send <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> by two; <S%G1417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> over the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits. <S%G4151><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G3853><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should take <S%G142><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> their journey, <S%G3598><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> a <S%G3361><s%> staff <S%G4464><s%> only: <S%G3440><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wallet, <S%G4082><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> money <S%G5475><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their purse, <S%G2223><s%>
but <S%G235><s%> to wear <S%G5265><s%> sandals, <S%G5265><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> put on <S%G1746><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> tunics. <S%G5509><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house, <S%G3614><s%> stay <S%G3306><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you depart <S%G1831><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%>

Whoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G99999><s%> will <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> as you depart <S%G1607><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> shake off <S%G1621><s%> the dust <S%G5522><s%> that is under <S%G5270><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against them. <S%G846><s%> Assuredly, <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> it will be <S%G2071><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for that <S%G1565><s%> city! <S%G4172><s%>"
They went out <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> people should repent. <S%G3340><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> demons, <S%G1140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anointed <S%G218><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> with oil <S%G1637><s%> who were sick, <S%G732><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> healed them. <S%G2323><s%>

King <S%G935><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G1063><s%> for his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> had <S%G1096><s%> become known, <S%G5318><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%> " <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer <S%G907><s%> has risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> these powers <S%G1411><s%> <S%G5124><s%> are at work <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

But others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "He <S%G3754><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Elijah. <S%G2243><s%>" <S%G1161><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "He <S%G3754><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a prophet, <S%G4396><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> when he heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G3754><s%> said, "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> beheaded. <S%G607><s%> He <S%G846><s%> has risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> had sent out <S%G649><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> arrested John, <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G2266><s%> of Herodias, <S%G846><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>'s wife, <S%G1135><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he had married <S%G1060><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Herod, <S%G3754><s%> "It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for you <S%G4671><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>'s wife. <S%G1135><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Herodias <S%G2266><s%> set herself <S%G1758><s%> against him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> desired <S%G2309><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> she <S%G3756><s%> couldn <S%G1410><s%>'t,

for <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> feared <S%G5399><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was a righteous <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kept <S%G4933><s%> him <S%G846><s%> safe. <S%G2532><s%> When he heard <S%G191><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> many things, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> gladly. <S%G2234><s%>

Then <S%G3753><s%> a convenient <S%G2121><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> that Herod <S%G2264><s%> on his <S%G846><s%> birthday <S%G1077><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> a supper <S%G1173><s%> for his <S%G846><s%> nobles, <S%G2532><s%> the high officers, <S%G5506><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief <S%G4413><s%> men of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> herself <S%G846><s%> came in <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> danced, <S%G3738><s%> she pleased <S%G700><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> sitting with him. <S%G4873><s%> The king <S%G935><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the young lady, <S%G2877><s%> "Ask <S%G154><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> you want, <S%G2309><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1437><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> it to you. <S%G4671><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> to her, <S%G3754><s%> "Whatever <S%G3739><s%> you shall ask <S%G154><s%> of me, <S%G3165><s%> I <S%G1437><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> up to <S%G2193><s%> half <S%G2255><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> kingdom. <S%G932><s%>"

She <S%G1161><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> shall I ask? <S%G154><s%>" She said, <S%G2036><s%> "The head <S%G2776><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer. <S%G910><s%>"

She <S%G2532><s%> came in <S%G1525><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> haste <S%G4710><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the king, <S%G935><s%> and asked, <S%G154><s%> <S%G3004><s%> "I want <S%G2309><s%> you to <S%G2443><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> right now <S%G1824><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer <S%G910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter. <S%G4094><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> king <S%G935><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> exceedingly sorry, <S%G4036><s%> but for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G3727><s%> of his oaths, <S%G2532><s%> and of his <S%G4873><s%> dinner guests, <S%G3588><s%> he <S%G2309><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> wish to refuse <S%G114><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> out a soldier <S%G4688><s%> of his guard, <S%G1161><s%> and commanded <S%G2004><s%> to bring <S%G5342><s%> John <S%G2776><s%>'s head, and <S%G1161><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> and beheaded <S%G607><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prison, <S%G5438><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter, <S%G4094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> it <S%G846><s%> to the young lady; <S%G2877><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the young lady <S%G2877><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> it <S%G846><s%> to her <S%G846><s%> mother. <S%G3384><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G2064><s%> they came and <S%G2532><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> corpse, <S%G4430><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> gathered themselves together <S%G4863><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> they had done, <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> they had taught. <S%G1321><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "You <S%G5210><s%> <S%G846><s%> come <S%G1205><s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a <S%G2398><s%> deserted <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rest <S%G373><s%> awhile. <S%G3641><s%>" For <S%G1063><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> going, <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2119><s%> no <S%G3761><s%> leisure <S%G2119><s%> so much as to eat. <S%G5315><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G1519><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> to a <S%G2596><s%> deserted <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> by themselves. <S%G2398><s%>

They <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> them <S%G846><s%> going, <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> recognized <S%G1921><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ran <S%G4936><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> on foot <S%G3979><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the cities. <S%G4172><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> arrived <S%G4281><s%> before them <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came together <S%G4905><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came out, <S%G1831><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> <S%G2192><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> a shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> many things. <S%G4183><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> late <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G2235><s%> the day, <S%G5610><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and said, <S%G3754><s%> "This place <S%G5117><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> deserted, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it is late <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G2235><s%> the day. <S%G5610><s%>

Send <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the surrounding <S%G2945><s%> country <S%G68><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> villages, <S%G2968><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>"

But he answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "You <S%G5210><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> something to eat. <S%G5315><s%>" They <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Shall we go <S%G565><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> denarii <S%G1220><s%> worth of bread, <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> something to eat? <S%G5315><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> do you <S%G2192><s%> have? <S%G2192><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> see. <S%G1492><s%>" When <S%G2532><s%> they knew, <S%G1097><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Five, <S%G4002><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fish. <S%G2486><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G2004><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that everyone <S%G3956><s%> should <S%G347><s%> sit down <S%G347><s%> in groups <S%G4849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the green <S%G5515><s%> grass. <S%G5528><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> sat down <S%G377><s%> in ranks, <S%G4237><s%> by <S%G303><s%> hundreds <S%G1540><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G303><s%> fifties. <S%G4004><s%>

He took <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> and looking <S%G308><s%> up to <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he blessed <S%G2127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> broke <S%G2622><s%> the loaves, <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> set before <S%G3908><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he divided the two <S%G1417><s%> fish <S%G2486><s%> among <S%G3307><s%> them all. <S%G3956><s%>
